text: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيۡلَكُمۡ لَا تَفۡتَرُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا فَيُسۡحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٖۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ

translation.en: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]
translation.id: Musa berkata kepada mereka (para pesihir), "Celakalah kamu! Janganlah kamu mengada-adakan kebohongan terhadap Allah, nanti Dia membinasakan kamu dengan azab." Dan sungguh rugi orang yang mengada-adakan kebohongan
